raw akas.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End

akas: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (original title)
akas from release info: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (original title)

1.title: Ultimate Backyard Paradises

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: After transforming more than 150 backyards into paradises, Lucas is revisiting five of his favorite builds and families. Lucas and his team reveal their never-before-seen, most outrageous backyard creations.

2.title: What's Up Dock?

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Lucas has a very special project ahead of him - building a giant pool for a dear friend turned client. Lucas creates a dream backyard complete with a dock, large cascading waterfalls, fire pit and an audio/visual entertainment swim-up bar.

3.title: Piña Pool-ada

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Lucas is back at it again delivering a paradise backyard. On his first ever collaboration with a local design team, Lucas creates a tropical oasis complete with an island, one of the largest grotto rocks he's ever used and a Tiki-themed cabana.

4.title: Dream Mulligan

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Lucas is tasked with a challenging project - repair and remodel an unusable pool for a famous golfing family. Puzzled as to how this pool was even built, Lucas creates an ocean-themed pool with fire features, an infinity edge and a water couch.

5.title: Top of the Mountain

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Lucas heads west to Bountiful, UT to build a dream backyard on the side of a mountain. Faced with many challenges, Lucas creates a Tuscan themed pool with a spa, the biggest linear fire wall he's ever built and a grotto with a 23,000 pound lid.

6.title: Sliding Into Neverland

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Lucas creates a sports area, a sun shelf and his first covered slide; and golfer J.B. Holmes says he never wants to grow up, but his wife wants relaxation.

7.title: Small Yard, Big Dream

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: A caregiver gets her lifelong wish of having her own pool; Lucas faces a pressure of building a dream pool in a small backyard; and the team transforms the family's yard into a little oasis with big potential.

8.title: Rocks of Love

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Lucas is tasked with creating a Mediterranean backyard resort with a Caribbean twist for a client's wedding anniversary. The team builds a paradise dream complete with a 30-person infinity edge spa, more than 10 fire features and his first ever outdoor gym.

1.title: Swimming with the Fishes

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The Lucas Lagoons crew turns a koi pond project into a backyard oasis for a family and their fish in Siesta Key. The team transforms an old, outdated pool into a natural lagoon, connecting it to the new pond and installing an amazing aquaponics system.

2.title: Mountain Lodge Oasis

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The Lucas Lagoons crew faces the unique challenge of building a Rocky Mountain-style lagoon for a family living in the Florida wetlands. Lucas quickly learns his clients will be supervising him along the way as he creates the pool of their dreams.

3.title: Paradise on the Bay

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The Lucas Lagoons crew creates a bayside paradise for a couple with a home in Snead Island, FL. Lucas is stymied by the challenge of building an outdoor living space, pool, spa, fire features and kitchen... all without any of his signature rockwork.

4.title: In Hot Water

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: After ten years of saving and dreaming for a pool, a couple wants Lucas to build the wow factor. The crew creates a giant double-pool feature with a connecting stream and several customized surprises to deliver the "wow" and dismiss any doubt.

5.title: Growing Pains

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: A couple with a baby wants Lucas to remodel their dangerously outdated pool and make it safe for their son. The goal is to preserve the pool's cage while swinging in massive rocks to transform a dull patio pool into a stunning natural atrium.

6.title: Green with Envy

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Lucas and the crew build a Caribbean destination in a landlocked backyard. It's a clash of wills, as the clients demand that a reluctant Lucas use some green rocks to create a tropical oasis with a sand bottom, salt-water pool loaded with features.

1.title: Welcome to the Jungle!

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Pool designer Lucas Congdon and his crew take on the challenge of bringing the jungle to life in a suburban backyard.

2.title: Living Under the Sea

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Pool designer Lucas Congdon must create an outdoor water room in which a mermaid could live. Former clients in love with all things ocean ask Lucas to remodel the tiny pool in their new home that sits just yards away from the Gulf of Mexico.

3.title: Fiesta De Laguna!

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: It's fiesta time as pool designer Lucas Congdon and his crew are challenged to create a Mexican resort in a Venice, Florida residential backyard. Lucas encounters several design "firsts" on his journey to infuse the flavors of Mexico into his creation.

4.title: Rockin' It in Rocket City

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Lucas goes to Huntsville, Alabama to build the lifelong dream pool of a retiring military couple. Lucas designs the largest grotto enclosed spa and widest waterfall of his career. This build also requires a tornado shelter.

5.title: Waterpark Wonderland

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Pool genius Lucas transforms a neglected backyard into a waterpark wonderland! With his most extreme remodel yet, Lucas creates a family fun zone, complete with waterslide and double decker outdoor party space. But it's not all fun 'n games.

6.title: Zen & the Art of Pools

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Lucas takes his art of backyard transformations to Parrish, FL where a couple requests the ultimate space of tranquility and relaxation. Building a serene oasis is one thing, but can Lucas calm down his crazy crew enough to tap into their inner Zen?

7.title: Hidden Party Zone

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Lucas takes on the nearly impossible challenge to transform a tiny, suburban backyard into a luxurious 5-star resort-worthy pool space, hiding its secret identity as the ultimate sports and party fanatic's entertainment zone!

8.title: For the Birds

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: A multi-generational, environmentally conscious family living in a designated bird sanctuary in Osprey, FL asks design expert Lucas Congdon to create both a human pool paradise and a bird pond oasis, all in one outdated, rundown backyard.

9.title: A Lazy River Runs Through It

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Lucas and crew build their first lazy river! This private lazy river circumnavigates a real island, massive waterfalls and a giant grotto. Lucas kicks it up several notches with a state of the art audio/video system, outdoor kitchen and special surprise!

10.title: Castle by the Sea

episode of.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Lucas faces an epic challenge building a pool fit for a Roman palace on the Gulf of Mexico. Lucas journeys far outside his comfort zone and even taps Emperor Caesar for help on his quest to fulfill his clients' dream of living in a castle by the sea.

imdb.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End
plot: Lucas Congdon creates lagoons that will blow your mind.
